title: Breakfast Shake using the Compact Portable Blending/Chopping System
description: Cuisinart's NEW Compact Portable Blending/Chopping System features one touch operation that's hands free for continuous use. With a 350 watt motor and three speeds to choose from you can easily mix sauces, puree soups and crush ice for frozen drinks. The four convenient travel cups are BPA free and ideal for breakfast on the go.

asset.author: Cuisinart Canada

transcripts:
[MUSIC PLAYING]

Breakfast for the road will allow me to show you how you can blend for one. A table spoon of flax seed and using the grinding head goes in simple. Look at that. No aligning. It just drops into position. On high 10 to 15 seconds and I have a perfect ground flag seed I love these simple breakfast shakes. So easy to throw together and yet they're so nutritious. Fresh blue berries in, three straw berries stemmed. What I also love is there is no prep. I can just pour all these ingredients together. Some orange juice or your favorite fruit juice, some really healthy Greek yogurt. You'll give really nice richness. And then the best part is I can switch to the blending blade. It self levels, it finds the sweet spot so easily. I flip it, drop it in, and in just a few seconds I have the perfect shake for the road.
